snippet: Why all the channeling? There’s nothing wrong with comparing a young singer to an older one, a memoir writer to a famous literary character, or a yoga aficionado to Gumby. But to my ear, at least, the freshness of those recent comparisons was lost...
abstract: Why all the channeling? There’s nothing wrong with comparing a young singer to an older one, a memoir writer to a famous literary character, or a yoga aficionado to Gumby. But to my ear, at least, the freshness of those recent comparisons was lost because we fell back on a faddish and annoying cliché: So-and-so is “channeling” his “inner” what’s-his-name.
